item.title: Sketches in Processing
item.description:
Lately I have been curious about Fractals and Psychedelic patterns. This escalated when I found out about Daniel Shiffman’s Coding Train tutorials. Here are a collection of explorations and Processing Sketches I worked on.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by supriya dutta (@_supriya_dutta_) on Feb 18, 2020 at 7:11am PST
View this post on Instagram A post shared by supriya dutta (@_supriya_dutta_) on Feb 10, 2020 at 10:36am PST

item.title: 600 years of Ahom Kingdom
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Data Visualization Guide Tools used Prof. Vekatesh Rajamanickam d3js, mapbox, QGIS Link 600 years of Ahom Kingdom Ahoms dynasty were the most celebrated in assamese history. With a successful reign of 600 years they were able to enrich Assam with agriculture, architecture, cultural richness and different scientific interventions.
